title: Region defined by exp. and quartic functions part - b

content.question: Region S is the base of a solid whose cross sections perpendicular to the x-axis are squares. Find the volume of the solid.

frqParts.text: Region S is the base of a solid whose cross sections perpendicular to the x-axis are squares. Find the volume of the solid.

topic.text: 8.7: Volumes with Cross Sections - Squares and Rectangles
